name: build a tank!
description:
Thanks for playing! I hope you enjoy  and If you want to see more games the check out my itch page.

HOW TO PLAY:

use Wasd and your cursor to aim and shoot enemy tanks! Collect coins to upgrade and improve your vehicle. If you need help fighting, you can always kill an enemy and take their power up.

CREDITS:

all assets made by the ant dev. Game made in the godot engine
